benchmark_details.name: Darija Open Dataset (DODa)
benchmark_details.overview: DODa represents an open-source project aimed at enhancing Natural Language Processing capabilities for the Moroccan dialect, Darija. With approximately 100,000 entries, it stands as the largest collaborative project of its kind for Darija-English translation, featuring semantic and syntactic categorizations, variations in spelling, verb conjugations across multiple tenses, and tens of thousands of translated sentences.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To enhance research and application development in the Moroccan dialect, Darija.

data.source: Open source contributions from the Moroccan community and existing linguistic resources.

methodology.calculation: Metrics will be calculated based on the evaluation dataset intended for assessing translation models for Moroccan Darija.
methodology.interpretation: Good performance is indicated by high accuracy in translation and contextual usage.
methodology.validation: The benchmark will include a wide range of test cases covering different aspects of the Darija language.
